document.full_text: the british government may start selling its stakes in the lloyds banking group and royal bank of scotland as soon as next year, following a strategy similar to the one employed by the united states as it exited citigroup.
document.title: britain may follow u.s. playbook for lloyds and r.b.s.
lines_and_colors: the british government may start selling its stakes in the lloyds banking group and royal bank of scotland as soon as next year, following a strategy similar to the one employed by the united states as it exited citigroup.
